title: ive got promos (lyrical parody)
body:
just did this for fun;

im aiming for the gold again tonight,
not a problem to be seen,
a team of respected players,
and I am ADC,
our bot lane is ploughing, 
lucky I have a support by my side,
too good for them, haven't even triedddd

don't surrender, let us win please,
be the rager, troll or feed,
them feels, its real, don't let it show,
that you got baron just befo',

we won promos, we got to gold,
can't hold it in, anymore,
we won promos, we got to gold,
stomping scrubs and freelo whores,
I don't care,
what team they'll play,
let the season rage on, the hate never bothered me anyway
--------------

i don't play ranked i know.

here's a secret;  http://wac.450f.edgecastcdn.net/80450F/thefw.com/files/2013/05/Nicholson.gif
